requirement: 根据拓扑，该实验不得使用汇总配置；R1到AS2全部最佳选路，且存在备份路径；R4/5/6到R1的两个环回实现负载分担，且存在备份。

configs.R1:
# 
sysname R1 
# 
interface LoopBack0 
 ip address 1.1.1.1 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface LoopBack1 
 ip address 1.1.2.1 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0 
 ip address 12.1.1.1 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1 
 ip address 13.1.1.1 255.255.255.0 
# 
ospf 1 router-id 1.1.1.1 
 area 0.0.0.0 
 network 1.1.1.1 0.0.0.0 
 network 1.1.2.1 0.0.0.0 
 network 12.1.1.1 0.0.0.0 
 network 13.1.1.1 0.0.0.0 
# 
bgp 1 
router-id 1.1.1.1 
peer 12.1.1.2 as-number 2 
peer 13.1.1.2 as-number 2 
network 1.1.1.0 24 
network 1.1.2.0 24 
# 
return
configs.R2:
# 
sysname R2 
# 
interface LoopBack0 
 ip address 2.2.2.2 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0 
 ip address 12.1.1.2 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1 
 ip address 24.1.1.1 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/2 
 ip address 23.1.1.1 255.255.255.0 
# 
ospf 1 router-id 2.2.2.2 
 area 0.0.0.0 
 network 2.2.2.2 0.0.0.0 
 network 24.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
 network 23.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
 network 12.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
# 
bgp 2 
router-id 2.2.2.2 
peer 12.1.1.1 as-number 1 
peer 3.3.3.3 as-number 2 
peer 4.4.4.4 as-number 2 
peer 5.5.5.5 as-number 2 
network 2.2.2.0 24 
# 
return
configs.R3:
# 
sysname R3 
# 
interface LoopBack0 
 ip address 3.3.3.3 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0 
 ip address 13.1.1.2 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1 
 ip address 35.1.1.1 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/2 
 ip address 23.1.1.2 255.255.255.0 
# 
ospf 1 router-id 3.3.3.3 
 area 0.0.0.0 
 network 3.3.3.3 0.0.0.0 
 network 35.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
 network 23.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
 network 13.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
# 
bgp 2 
router-id 3.3.3.3 
peer 13.1.1.1 as-number 1 
peer 2.2.2.2 as-number 2 
peer 5.5.5.5 as-number 2 
peer 4.4.4.4 as-number 2 
network 3.3.3.0 24 
ip ip-prefix p permit 1.1.1.0 24 
route-policy p permit node 10 
route-policy p permit node 20 
# 
bgp 2 
peer 6.6.6.6 route-policy p import 
# 
return
configs.R4:
# 
sysname R4 
# 
interface LoopBack0 
 ip address 4.4.4.4 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0 
 ip address 24.1.1.1 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1 
 ip address 45.1.1.1 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/2 
 ip address 46.1.1.1 255.255.255.0 
# 
ospf 1 router-id 4.4.4.4 
 area 0.0.0.0 
 network 4.4.4.4 0.0.0.0 
 network 46.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
 network 45.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
 network 24.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
# 
bgp 2 
router-id 4.4.4.4 
peer 5.5.5.5 as-number 2 
peer 6.6.6.6 as-number 2 
peer 2.2.2.2 as-number 2 
peer 3.3.3.3 as-number 2 
network 4.4.4.0 24 
ip ip-prefix p permit 1.1.1.0 24 
route-policy p permit node 10 
route-policy p permit node 20 
bgp 2 
peer 6.6.6.6 route-policy p import 
# 
return
configs.R5:
# 
sysname R5 
# 
interface LoopBack0 
 ip address 5.5.5.5 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0 
 ip address 35.1.1.2 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1 
 ip address 45.1.1.2 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/2 
 ip address 56.1.1.1 255.255.255.0 
# 
ospf 1 router-id 5.5.5.5 
 area 0.0.0.0 
 network 5.5.5.5 0.0.0.0 
 network 35.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
 network 45.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
 network 56.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
# 
bgp 2 
router-id 5.5.5.5 
peer 6.6.6.6 as-number 2 
peer 4.4.4.4 as-number 2 
peer 3.3.3.3 as-number 2 
peer 2.2.2.2 as-number 2 
peer 3.3.3.3 reflect-client 
network 5.5.5.0 24 
# 
return
configs.R6:
# 
sysname R6 
# 
interface LoopBack0 
 ip address 6.6.6.6 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0 
 ip address 46.1.1.2 255.255.255.0 
# 
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1 
 ip address 56.1.1.2 255.255.255.0 
# 
ospf 1 router-id 6.6.6.6 
 area 0.0.0.0 
 network 6.6.6.6 0.0.0.0 
 network 46.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
 network 56.1.1.0 0.0.0.255 
# 
bgp 2 
router-id 6.6.6.6 
peer 4.4.4.4 as-number 2 
peer 5.5.5.5 as-number 2 
network 6.6.6.0 24 
# 
return
